Package arcade.env.lat

Class TriEnvLat

java.lang.Object
arcade.env.lat.EnvLattice
arcade.env.lat.TriEnvLat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Lattice
public class TriEnvLat
extends EnvLattice
Extension of EnvLattice for triangular lattice.

TriEnvLat uses the TriDiffuser for diffusion on a triangular grid. Triangular grid locations have (x,y) coordinates, but additionally have are "up" or "down" facing.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.3.10
